name: ObjectiveDropbox
summary: Unofficial Objective-C SDK for Dropbox HTTP API v2
description:
ObjectiveDrobpoox contains all necessary classes for working with Dropbox via Objectve-C on iOS.
Cocoapods installation supports iOS 8.0 and above. If you need iOS 7 support, copy all ObjectiveDrobpox files in your project manually and add WebView framework as optional dependency.
Start by creating an instance of DropboxClient class and call [dropboxClient getNewTokenWithSuccess:fail:].
